summary: A simple mod that makes the Transmute spell look for iron ore to upgrade to silver first, before looking for silver to upgrade to gold. This makes it easier to make silver, since you don\'t have to drop the ore pieces.
descriptionHtml:
A simple mod that makes the Transmute spell look for iron ore to upgrade to silver first, before looking for silver to upgrade to gold. This makes it easier to make silver, since you don\'t have to drop the ore pieces.

If you prefer having two transmute spells, one for iron to silver and one for silver to gold, check out [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8086]Mystra007\'s Transmute Overhaul[/url] instead.
author: argvminusone
